title: Support item stat adjustments
body:
The support item stats are really awkward and should change.

The health on spell thief items should be removed and stats should be buffed. 24 attack damage on a completed item is abysmal. Also shoulder guards currently gives more ad and hp making spectrals useless.

Also the relic shield items give too much adaptive force and the only support that benefits greatly is Pyke.

In conclusion the stats on support items need adjustment.
